hero.title: Create Your Own
hero.subtitle: Design beautiful, personalized journal pages in A5 format. Print on A4 paper, cut horizontally, and bind them into your perfect custom journal.
hero.description: Customize categories, set date ranges, and generate the exact number of pages you need.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Edit categories, choose locale, and personalize your journal to match your needs.

dateBased.title: Date-Based Generation
dateBased.description: Set start and end dates to automatically generate the perfect number of journal pages.

printReady.title: Print Ready
printReady.description: Export to PDF and print on standard A4 paper. No waste, no hassle.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in just a few simple steps

step1.title: Customize Your Categories
step1.description: Click "Edit Categories" to personalize the tracking categories for your journal. Add, remove, or modify up to 10 categories that matter to you.

step2.title: Choose Your Date Range
step2.description: Enable "Use Date Range" to set start and end dates, or disable it to manually enter the number of days you need.

step3.title: Preview Your Journal
step3.description: See your custom journal pages with your categories, dates, and layout in real-time. Each page includes space for daily tracking and reflection.

step4.title: Print & Assemble
step4.description: Click "Print / Save as PDF" to generate your journal. Print on A4 paper, cut horizontally to create A5 pages, and bind them together.

howItWorks.step4Alt: Your custom journal is ready to print!

footer.tagline: Design your journal, print it, and start journaling today.
